CustomField.description: If selected, adds data derived from Services CPQ to the Project Reporting dataset in the PS Cloud Core Analytics app. This data is used to create the Services CPQ Estimator and Estimate Manager dashboards in the PS Cloud Core Analytics app.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected, adds data derived from Services CPQ to the Project Reporting dataset in the PS Cloud Core Analytics app. This data is used to create the Services CPQ Estimator and Estimate Manager dashboards in the PS Cloud Core Analytics app.
CustomField.label: Services CPQ
